title: How to Make a Pornstar Cocktail

steps.headline: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker.
steps.description: Fill it about halfway with ice.

steps.headline: Measure and pour the ingredients into the shaker.
Shake the contents.
steps.description: Secure the lid on and vigorously shake it for a few seconds. You will know when the contents are cold when you see condensation building up on the outside of the shaker.

steps.headline: Strain the contents.
steps.description: Attach a strainer on the cocktail shaker (if the shaker doesn't have one) and strain it into a shot glass.

steps.headline: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker.
steps.description: Fill it about halfway with ice.

steps.headline: Measure and pour the ingredients into the shaker.
Stir the drink.
steps.description: Use a long cocktail stirrer to combine everything together.

steps.headline: Strain the contents.
steps.description: Attach a strainer on the cocktail shaker (if the shaker doesn't have one) and strain it into a highball glass.

steps.headline: Prepare a beer mug.
steps.description: Measure the juice and 7-up and add it to the mug.

steps.headline: Prepare a shot glass.
steps.description: Measure equal parts of the pucker and blue curacao into the glass.

steps.headline: Drop the shot glass into the beer mug.
